lstDialogOne: So that black and brownish jar 'might' of been laced with poison...
Honestly, The things you find out on the streets these days!
Anyway...I'm here to plead for forgiveness |p1
Could you find it in your heart to have mercy on a fool like me? |c
lstOutcomeYesText: Thank you my most gracious King!
lstOutcomeNoText: Damn you and your petty kingdom!
